header_text: You're at home, relaxing on the couch and watching your favorite TV show while also texting with a friend. However, you are struggling to focus on both tasks at the same time, making you feel overwhelmed. You remind yourself that if you need to pause your show or take a break from texting, then that is okay.

elements.Text: Taking a little longer to respond to your friend's text is...
